org.apache.flink.streaming.api

Class JobGraphBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.JobGraphBuilder

  • public class JobGraphBuilder
extends Object
    Object for building Apache Flink stream processing job graphs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JobGraphBuilder()
      Creates an new JobGraph with the given name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JobGraphBuilder

        public JobGraphBuilder()
        Creates an new JobGraph with the given name. A JobGraph is a DAG and consists of sources, tasks (intermediate vertices) and sinks.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultParallelism

        public int getDefaultParallelism()

      • setDefaultParallelism

        public void setDefaultParallelism(int defaultParallelism)

      • getExecutionParallelism

        public int getExecutionParallelism()

      • setExecutionParallelism

        public void setExecutionParallelism(int executionParallelism)

      • addStreamVertex

        public <IN,OUT> void addStreamVertex(String vertexName,
                                     StreamInvokable<IN,OUT> invokableObject,
                                     TypeWrapper<?> inTypeWrapper,
                                     TypeWrapper<?> outTypeWrapper,
                                     String operatorName,
                                     byte[] serializedFunction,
                                     int parallelism)
        Adds a vertex to the streaming JobGraph with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        vertexName - Name of the vertex
        invokableObject - User defined operator
        inTypeWrapper - Input type wrapper for serialization
        outTypeWrapper - Output type wrapper for serialization
        operatorName - Operator type
        serializedFunction - Serialized udf
        parallelism - Number of parallel instances created

      • addIterationHead

        public void addIterationHead(String vertexName,
                             String iterationHead,
                             String iterationID,
                             int parallelism,
                             long waitTime)
        Adds a vertex for the iteration head to the JobGraph. The iterated values will be fed from this vertex back to the graph.
        Parameters:
        vertexName - Name of the vertex
        iterationHead - Id of the iteration head
        iterationID - ID of iteration for multiple iterations
        parallelism - Number of parallel instances created
        waitTime - Max wait time for next record

      • addIterationTail

        public void addIterationTail(String vertexName,
                             String iterationTail,
                             String iterationID,
                             int parallelism,
                             long waitTime)
        Adds a vertex for the iteration tail to the JobGraph. The values intended to be iterated will be sent to this sink from the iteration head.
        Parameters:
        vertexName - Name of the vertex
        iterationTail - Id of the iteration tail
        iterationID - ID of iteration for mulitple iterations
        parallelism - Number of parallel instances created
        waitTime - Max waiting time for next record

      • addCoTask

        public <IN1,IN2,OUT> void addCoTask(String vertexName,
                                    CoInvokable<IN1,IN2,OUT> taskInvokableObject,
                                    TypeWrapper<?> in1TypeWrapper,
                                    TypeWrapper<?> in2TypeWrapper,
                                    TypeWrapper<?> outTypeWrapper,
                                    String operatorName,
                                    byte[] serializedFunction,
                                    int parallelism)

      • setParallelism

        public void setParallelism(String vertexName,
                           int parallelism)
        Sets the number of parallel instances created for the given vertex.
        Parameters:
        vertexName - Name of the vertex
        parallelism - Number of parallel instances created

      • setMutability

        public void setMutability(String vertexName,
                          boolean isMutable)

      • setBufferTimeout

        public void setBufferTimeout(String vertexName,
                             long bufferTimeout)

      • setEdge

        public void setEdge(String upStreamVertexName,
                    String downStreamVertexName,
                    StreamPartitioner<?> partitionerObject,
                    int typeNumber,
                    List<String> outputNames,
                    boolean selectAll)
        Connects two vertices in the JobGraph using the selected partitioner settings
        Parameters:
        upStreamVertexName - Name of the upstream(output) vertex
        downStreamVertexName - Name of the downstream(input) vertex
        partitionerObject - Partitioner object
        typeNumber - Number of the type (used at co-functions)
        outputNames - User defined names of the out edge

      • setIterationSourceSettings

        public void setIterationSourceSettings(String iterationID,
                                       String iterationTail)
        Sets the parallelism and buffertimeout of the iteration head of the given iteration id to the parallelism given.
        Parameters:
        iterationID - ID of the iteration
        iterationTail - ID of the iteration tail

      • setOutputSelector

        public <T> void setOutputSelector(String vertexName,
                                  byte[] serializedOutputSelector)
        Sets a user defined OutputSelector for the given vertex. Used for directed emits.
        Parameters:
        vertexName - Name of the vertex for which the output selector will be set
        serializedOutputSelector - Byte array representing the serialized output selector.

      • setBytesFrom

        public void setBytesFrom(String from,
                         String to)
        Sets udf operator and TypeSerializerWrapper from one vertex to another, used with some sinks.
        Parameters:
        from - from
        to - to

      • getJobGraph

        public JobGraph getJobGraph(String jobGraphName)
        Gets the assembled JobGraph and adds a user specified name for it.
        Parameters:
        jobGraphName - name of the jobGraph
